__comment: Values prepended by __ are comments to actual values, without __ on the beginning
__app.json: This config file contains application parameters, there is no sensitive data and this file can be commited to public repository.

io.__loglevel: Log level for socket.io. 10 - very verbose, 1 - less verbose.

__limitWorkers: This value allows us to limit max number of worker processes spawn by kabam.startCluster() command. If this value is not set, we spawn number of workers equal to number of CPU cores
